help.title: Help & Support
help.contactSubtitle: We're here to help with any questions or concerns
help.faq1Question: How do I create a new note?
help.faq1Answer: Tap the "+" button on the home screen or in the navigation bar. You can add a title, description, images, and assign categories to organize your notes. Notes are saved automatically.
help.faq2Question: How do I organize my notes with categories?
help.faq2Answer: When creating or editing a note, select a category from the list at the bottom. You can also create custom categories in Settings > Categories. Filter notes by category on the home screen.
help.faq3Question: Can I sync my notes across devices?
help.faq3Answer: Yes! With audiFoil Pro, your bookings automatically sync across all your devices. Your data is securely stored in the cloud and accessible anytime, anywhere with an internet connection.
help.faq4Question: How do I search for specific notes?
help.faq4Answer: Tap the search icon in the header. You can search by title, description, or category. Premium members get AI-powered search that understands context and can find related notes.
help.faq5Question: Is my data safe and private?
help.faq5Answer: Yes! We use industry-standard encryption to protect your notes. Your data is encrypted both in transit and at rest. We never access or share your notes with third parties without your consent.
help.faq6Question: What happens if I accidentally delete a note?
help.faq6Answer: Notes are moved to a trash folder where they stay for 30 days. You can restore them from Settings > Trash. After 30 days, notes are permanently deleted. Premium members get unlimited backup history.
help.faq7Question: Can I share my notes with others?
help.faq7Answer: Yes! Long press any note and select "Share" to send it via email, messaging, or other apps. Premium members can create shared notebooks for real-time collaboration with others.
help.faq8Question: What features do I get with audiFoil Pro?
help.faq8Answer: audiFoil Pro includes priority booking, exclusive time slots, cloud sync across all devices, priority support, and early access to new locations. Try it free for 7 days!
